price: Nsεnkyerεnee a Yɛyi kyerεε wͻn (akyire yi) biara no, na εso kyεn ne nua (nsεnkyerεnee dada a edii kan no); na Yεde asotwee sͻͻ wͻn mu sεdeε wͻbεsan wͻn akyi (afiri kwan bͻne so aba kwan pa no soͻ).
arabic: وَمَا نُرِيهِم مِّنۡ ءَايَةٍ إِلَّا هِيَ أَكۡبَرُ مِنۡ أُخۡتِهَاۖ وَأَخَذۡنَٰهُم بِٱلۡعَذَابِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā nurīhim min āyatin illā hiya akbaru min ukh'tihā wa-akhadhnāhum bil-ʿadhābi laʿallahum yarjiʿūna
